HelloTitle:
Hi!
This application was created to 
rename ingame titles for War Thunder.
Show the path to your game directory
customizationWinTitle: Select a title from the list and enter a new name.
resetsettingswintitle:
Are you sure? This action will reset the translation of titles, all settings,
as well as reset the language file of the game..
dataerror: The data is entered incorrectly. Please try again
